  "Allegations" : "Client alleged that her advisor misrepresented the managed investment account as a proprietary product that would earn two to four percent annually and that he did not disclose the ongoing fees.   "Broker Comment" : "While meeting with the client and determining her investment goals and objectives, we verbally discussed the structure of the account including all details relating to any ongoing management fees. The client signed all of the required account documentation and disclosures."
